remarks:
The sum of a real number and a second real number is less than the real number iff the second real number is negative.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-May-2018.) 

---

 The sum of a real number and a second real number is less then the real number iff the second real number is negative.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-May-2018.)
statement: leaddle0 $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( A + B ) <_ A <-> B <_ 0 ) ) $.
